title: Toward a privacy-preserving predictive foundation model of single-cell transcriptomics with federated learning and tabular modeling
details: J Ding, J Lin, S Jiang, Y Wang, Z Mao, Z Fang, J Tang… - bioRxiv, 2025
abstract: The ability to pre-train on vast amounts of data to build foundation models (FMs) has achieved remarkable success in numerous domains, including natural language processing, computer vision, and, more recently, single-cell genomics-epitomized by …
